name: Hot Wheels Monster Trucks Mystery Trucks

description.en-us: Being part of the Hot Wheels Monster Trucks line in 2018 & 2019 , these mini scale Monster Trucks where hidden in Mystery boxes. Also included within the Mystery boxes is a key that you can insert into the back of the trucks, and with the push of a button, can launch them.
